page.title: 10FAMILY LIFE - UNEMPLOYED 1
page.content: One of the most depressing things for the local unemployed men is to hear those with jobs complaining about those on the dole. They seem to think we are on the dole out of choice. I was made redundant three years ago and as an unskilled man I am finding it impossible to find a nother job when there are so many others in the same position. It certainly affects my family. I have three children and live in a semi-detached council house. I had hoped to buy the house from the council but that is out of the question now. Since becoming unemployed life has changed drastically. We cannot afford holidays, new clothes or new things for the house. I feel bad at Christmas because we cannot give the children what other children get.
